sources.title: Pirate Ship (1933)
sources.description: Pre-Mighty Mouse operetta-singing mice sink a ship of evil pirates.  Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/pirate-ship-1933/

metadata.Plot: Operetta-singing mice on a pirate ship: Where have I seen that before? Well, MIGHTY MOUSE AND THE PIRATES for one. Paul Terry liked to recycle his plot ideas and this is about the oldest version from his studio that I have seen -- Mighty Mouse is replaced by the Navy Air Force.Although there are lots of the usual budget-stretching Paul Terry cheats throughout, including a recycling first shot, the people who did the art certainly took their time. The characters are as highly detailed as any I have ever seen and the pirate ship is also fully realized. If the gags are recycled from a hundred earlier cartoons and will appear in a hundred more, they are appropriate, so this one is quite watchable.Apparently it ran short as there is a one-minute epilogue. Even with that, this one times in at less than six minutes -- but I saw a Castle re-release, so it may be trimmed.
